summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Inverness Drive from East 85th Street to the Northern Pacific Railroad right-of-way; and certain other streets, avenues, and easements; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17139 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
